link.title: Washington Wilkes Comprehensive High School - News
Washington Wilkes Primary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

p.span: The mission of the Wilkes County School System is to increase student achievement and provide the necessary support for all students to graduate and flourish in a technological world.

a.title: Click to read more about: School Closed Until April 24

div.a: Read More about School Closed Until April 24

span.p: The health and safety of our school community is very important to us! We are closely monitoring the information available for COVID-19 and are staying up to date with the latest guidance from the Department of Public Health (DPH), the CDC and top state agencies. Should an outbreak occur in our community, we will follow the guidance of the DPH and the CDC.
Here is the link to the latest information from the Department of Public Health.
*We have participated in the statewide webinar directed by the Governor, Department of Public Health, the Department of Education and other agencies.

*We have met with our local EMA Director, Public Health Department, Hospital and County representation to review, update, and implement emergency operations plans (EOPs). . The best protections for COVID-19 are the same as those for FLU:
WASH YOU HANDS with soap for 20 seconds (sing two rounds of Happy Birthday song)

p.strong: Keep your hands away from your face

span.p: COVER COUGHS AND SNEEZES with your elbow or tissue (and throw away the tissue
Return to school/work only when FEVER-FREE WIITHOUT fever-reducing MEDS for 24 hours.
Check out our new Washington-Wilkes Tiger Athletics Page!

div.a: Donovan Anthony signs with Army-West Point

span.p: Washington-Wilkes Comprehensive High School is proud to announce that Donovan Anthony, Class of 2020, has received a full scholarship to the United States Military Academy at West Point.

span.span: Congratulations to the Class of 2020 Valedictorian Jessica Bridges and Salutatorian Madison Gunter!
